dependency update

Improve CORS support

In particular allow request with credentials which are not allowed when
only "Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *" is specified. Custom response
headers must be crafted for each request depending on the Origin request
header.

Also, enable preflight responses to Access-Control-Request-Headers and
Access-Control-Request-Method.

CHANGELOG for 0.7

Not-found type checking now defaults to text/html

This means we assume a type match, unless we can positively establish that
types don't match. This covers issues like html/png confusion while still
allowing flexibility to users.

Improve directory listing

- Different colors for directories, files and hidden files
- Change sort order so hidden files come last
Nicer 404 page
Add devd version to directory listings
Improve empty directory listing

Notfound specs also over-ride directory listings

So a spec like this "/foo.html" will serve foo.html for requests to "/".

Check that expected types match before serving over-ride

This is a heuristic, but it's one that's 99%+ accurate, and it catches a large
number of common issues with over-rides. We may want to consider an option to
turn the heuristic off if there are requests for it.

Merge pull request #67 from aellerton/master

Improve route visibility and failure handling

Improve route scheme parsing

- A route with the "ws://" protocol now fails with message
  "Websocket protocol not supported"

  Without this change, devd starts without error for a websocket route
  but interprets the route as a local file source. Prefer fail fast.

- Routes like "localhost:1234" that omit "http://" or "https://"
  now fail with message like
  "Unknown scheme 'localhost': did you mean http or https?: localhost:1234/ws"

  Without the change the route "localhost:1234" is interpreted as a
  local file path.

- At startup, the routes are logged at debug level:

    13:21:55: Route /api/ -> forward to http://localhost:8080/api
    13:21:55: Route / -> reads files from public/

Add a script to generate homebrew formula

Run this as follows:

    ./scripts/mkbrew v0.5 > formula.rb

The resulting formula won't run right now, because we'll first need to do a
release with the updated vendor dependencies.

Commit compiled rice templates

This fixes an issue where installing devd with "go get" results in a binary
that's not standalone. It also simplifies the homebrew build process.

We use modd to auto-compile these and make the process easier to deal with.

Silence at least some Firefox console errors

This is all due to the stupid un-addressed bug here: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=712329

This patch does as much as we can to silence these errors, but it's still far
from a complete fix. Unfortunately I don't think we can do much more.

Merge pull request #9 from brennie/dev/exclude-files

Add an exclude flag

Add an exclude flag

The exclude flag (`-x` or `--exclude`) will add a file glob pattern to a
set of excludes. When excludes are specified, paths that are watched
will only trigger live reloads if one of the modified files does not
match the exclude patterns.

A unit tests has been added for file excluding to ensure that it behaves
correctly.

This patch fixes #8.

Merge pull request #2 from brennie/dev/improve-locking

Prefer embedding sync.Mutex

Prefer embedding sync.Mutex

This patch emebds `sync.Mutex` into the `Server` and `maxLatencyWriter`
types. This allows them to be used as locks themselves instead of
accessing a member to handle the locking/unlocking.
